All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Box
    This class stores the contents of a box and its integer dimensions.
    BusinessDoc
    General class of documents that an organization can have
    BusinessDocCreator
    Class that checks what type of document is received and returns an instance of the same Checks whether the document is an invoice.
    BusinessTableInterface
    Interface for document specific requirements such as checking end of table, merging rows - methods that will change with doc type
    BusinessWordExtractor
    This class extracts the value data from the PDF Document excluding the table part.
    CacheManager
    Cache Manager of Application
    Column
    Class that denotes a column heading in the table
    GuiAdder
    This class serves as the Base class for the package
    and takes GUI input from user and call classes
    as required for XML Generation.
    InvoiceDocument
    Class that represents an invoice page
    InvoiceItemsTable
    Class represents special case of table - items table in an invoice doc
    Messages  
    MyConstants  
    myPDFTextStripper
    Class that extends PDFTextStripper provided by PDFBox Library.
    MyPDRectangle
    Class that extends PDRectangle class of PDFBox.
    MyStreamEngine
    Class that extends PDFStreamEngine class of PDFBox.
    NonStandardInvoiceDocument
    Catch-all class for documents that are not classified as invoice
    NonStandardTable
    Class that represents a table in a non standard invoice document
    PDF2XML
    This class creates an object of XMLCreator class
    and adds the XML pages to the generated XML
    pagewise.
    PDF2XMLTester
    This class checks if the given list of pages
    holds correct for the PDF specified
    and prompts for XML Generation.
    PDFLine
    Class that represents a line in the document
    StringBlock
    PDFTextStripper divides the text in a document into blocks.
    Table
    Class that represents a generic table in any document that an organization handles
    XMLCreator
    This class creates an XML File of name same as the original PDF
    and the then date and time and adds the tabular and unstructured
    component of PDF pagewise to the XML File.
